import React from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { selector } from '../redux/entities/cars'; import { formatPrice, carLink } from '../helpers'; import { Filters, Brands, Paginate } from '../partials'; import { routes } from '../routes'; export default function Cars() { const cars = useSelector((state) => selector(state).data); return (

Cars

  1. You Are Here:
  2. Home
  3. Car List
{cars.map((item) => (
{item.year} {item.make} {item.model}

{formatPrice(item.price)}

{item.description}

{item.rating} out of 5.0
))}
); } export async function getServerSideProps() { return { props: { title: 'ClassyDrive - ', description: '', }, }; }
